question: Is there any treatment for the Facioscapulohumeral Muscular Dystrophy?
ideal_answer: No, currently there are no approved therapies for the Facioscapulohumeral Muscular Dystrophy, only supportive treatment.

snippets.text: The treatment of FSHD is currently supportive only.
Facioscapulohumeral muscular dystrophy (FSHD) is a slowly progressive muscular dystrophy without approved therapies.
